ingredients.content: 400 g papaya, peeled and frozen in pieces (see tip)

preparations.content: Place sugar in mixing bowl and grind <b>15 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add papaya and mix <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add ice cubes and lime juice then, with aid of spatula, blend <b>40 sec/speed 9<b>.
With aid of spatula, blend again <b>30 sec/speed 9<b>, then serve immediately.
